link.title: COVID-19 Home | School District of Lancaster

meta.name: description
meta.content: A leader in urban education in the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, SDoL serves more than 11,000 students and is known for its rich diversity, broad academic offerings and highly professional faculty and staff.

a.span:
The School District of Lancaster is committed to providing our families and community with regular and timely updates on COVID-19, or Coronavirus. All district updates are published on a dedicated webpage on this site.
Coronavirus Updates

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-home mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-flyout mega-menu-item-28736
mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-24

img.br: Make a difference! The School District of Lancaster is looking for talented, committed professionals to join our team. Immediate openings in leadership, teaching and support staff!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-23

img.br: Welcome McCaskey Class of 2033! All children who will be 5 years of age on or before September 1, 2020 and reside in Lancaster City or Lancaster Township are eligible to enroll in kindergarten for the 2020-2021 school year. Make an appointment in our enrollment office!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-22

img.br: Pre-kindergarten applications now open! All children who will be 4 years of age on or before September 1, 2020 and reside in Lancaster City or Lancaster Township are eligible to apply for pre-k for the 2020-2021 school year. Spaces are limited and assigned based on need.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-21

img.br: Make a difference! The School District of Lancaster is looking for talented, committed professionals to join our team. Immediate openings in leadership, teaching and support staff!

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-20

img.br: We are here to help. SDoL has a full-time coordinator of parent concerns to help you and your family navigate challenges and find answers. Have a concern? Click below to let us know.

article.class: post-28905 page type-page status-publish hentry entry

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-28905 current_page_item menu-item-28925

div.p: The School District of Lancaster is closed indefinitely at the order of Pennsylvania Gov. Tom Wolf. The district is working daily to coordinate provision of services.

We remain in daily contact with the Pennsylvania Department of Health and the Center for Disease Control and prevention (CDC). We are urging the entire Lancaster community to heed warnings to avoid gatherings of 10 or more people (social distancing) that facilitate the spread of illness.

The School District of Lancaster is committed to providing families and staff with regular updates for the duration of this situation. All email updates are immediately published on a dedicated webpage.
The School District of Lancaster has provided educational resources to encourage learning at home while our schools are closed. Some include learning with devices and technology, while others do not.
Answers to some of the most frequently asked questions so far. This is a very fluid and unprecedented situation. Please be patient and understand that we do not have all the answers at this time.
Find information on the novel coronavirus disease and prevention.
Are you unable to find the answer you are looking for? We have created a dedicated form for you to ask specific questions. We will make every effort to respond in a timely manner.

div.h2: School board authorizes purchase of additional 4,600 iPads
div.p: The School District of Lancaster board of directors on Tuesday authorized the district to purchase an additional 4,600 iPads at a cost of nearly $2 million. The additional devices will ensure the district can provide one device per student, though delivery is not expected in time for this school year. The bold move comes in […]

a.title: School board authorizes purchase of additional 4,600 iPads

div.h2: SDoL establishes virtual enrollment, including kindergarten registration
div.p: The School District of Lancaster is accepting enrollments by students new to the district, for the current school year, as well as kindergarten enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year. To enroll in SDoL for the current school year, click below to schedule virtual enrollment appointment: Schedule Required documents (including Proof of Birth, Immunization Records, Proof […]

a.title: SDoL establishes virtual enrollment, including kindergarten registration

div.p: Grab-and-go meals are distributed every Tuesday and Thursday from five locations in the School District of Lancaster. You may choose the most convenient location to pick up your meals. Click on the maps below to view pickup locations and traffic patterns.

$(document).ready(function() { $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select").change(function() { // Get the selected value var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); // Get the ID of this element var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); // Reset so all values are showing: $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); }); $(".school-choice-one .gfield_select").each(function() { if ($(this).attr("id") != thisID) { $("option[value='" + selected + "']", $(this)).attr( "disabled", "disabled" ).siblings().removeAttr("disabled"); } }); }); $(".school-choice-two .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-two .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); } }); }); $(".school-choice-four .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-four .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); } }); }); $(".school-choice-five .gfield_select").change(function() { var selected = $("option:selected", $(this)).val(); var thisID = $(this).attr("id"); $(".school-choice-five .gfield_select option").each(function() { $(this).show(); }); $(".school-choice-five .gfield_select").each(function() { if ($(this).attr("id") != thisID) { $("option[value='" + selected + "']", $(this)).attr( "disabled", "disabled" ).siblings().removeAttr("disabled"); } }); }); });
